actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 4 (1d4+2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Bile Spit
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +2 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 2 (1d4) acid damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 CON save or be smelly for 1 hour or until a creature spends 1 minute cleaning off the spit. A smelly creature has disadvantage on CHA checks.

special_abilities.name: Camel Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The camel is resistant to exhaustion, and it requires only half the amount of water that a typical Beast of its size needs.
